short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Augmented Learning Interface for Visual Engagement Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ALIVE provides Interactive Step-by-Step Guide, which makes it easy to deliver exceptional user experiences at scale. It 
simplifies complex processes and workflows with ALIVE's Interactive Guidance. ALIVE includes a suite of tools that help 
to enhance User Experience on any web-based application through applying audio feedbacks, visual cue card guidance 
and data validation concepts to it.
